title: Mechanical Uprising
description: Rogue automatons threaten to overrun the land. The player must uncover their creator's hidden lair and deactivate the production facility.
subquest: Investigate the recent automaton attacks and gather intel.
Follow the trail of clues to locate the creator's secret lair.
Navigate through a maze of traps and puzzles to access the lair.
Discover the creator's master plan and the source of their power.
Disable the production facility to halt the automaton uprising.
Confront the mastermind behind the rogue automatons and defeat them.
